argumentText:
ARGUMENT
t

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rgspnval.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) |
| 2 |  | rgspnval.b | |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 3 |  | rgspnval.ss | |- ( ph -> A C_ B ) |
| 4 |  | rgspnval.n | |- ( ph -> N = ( RingSpan ` R ) ) |
| 5 |  | rgspnval.sp | |- ( ph -> U = ( N ` A ) ) |
| 6 |  | rgspnmin.sr | |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
| 7 |  | rgspnmin.ss | |- ( ph -> A C_ S ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_rgspnval | |- ( ph -> U = |^| { t e. ( SubRing ` R ) | A C_ t } ) |
| 9 |  | #P_sseq2 | |- ( t = S -> ( A C_ t <-> A C_ S ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_elrab | |- ( S e. { t e. ( SubRing ` R ) | A C_ t } <-> ( S e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ A C_ S ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 7, 10 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> S e. { t e. ( SubRing ` R ) | A C_ t } ) |
| 12 |  | #P_intss1 | |- ( S e. { t e. ( SubRing ` R ) | A C_ t } -> |^| { t e. ( SubRing ` R ) | A C_ t } C_ S ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> |^| { t e. ( SubRing ` R ) | A C_ t } C_ S ) |
| 14 | 8, 13 | #P_eqsstrd | |- ( ph -> U C_ S ) |
